According to the nursery rhyme, it's when "the cradle will rock"

rounds.comments: (Alex: We will name a place for you--a town, a city. Keep in mind that that city has only one team in one of the major leagues--NBA, NHL, or NFL.)

rounds.text: The last song in this musical is "Tomorrow Is A Latter Day"
